name: Curivari - Epitome - 654
additionalNotes: Curivari Cigars honors master Cuban cigar makers by creating cigars from Cuban-seed, Nicaraguan-grown tobaccos and then topping them off with a triple cap. The Curivari Epitome is no exception. A Nicaraguan puro, the Curivari Epitome packs a powerhouse of spice accented with notes of pepper, walnut, and oak.
